summary: This mod is a WIP re-model and re-texture of the longbow. Currently is a vanilla model/texture with an unlimited knock back effect. Warbow is  also available on steam.
descriptionHtml: The Warbow has around 16 base attack, a powerful stagger enchantment with unlimited uses. As mentioned in short description I plan to do a whole new model and texture. This craftable bow is found in the iron category but requires the steel smithing perk to create.
author: Kiluminati
